metadata.description: Ultra-Premium Recruitment Automation Platform - Design System for Enterprise-Grade AI-Powered Hiring
metadata.design_philosophy: Sophisticated, trustworthy, cutting-edge yet approachable. Balances corporate professionalism with modern tech innovation. Every element conveys premium quality and intelligent automation.
metadata.premium_enhancement: Enhanced for ultra-premium recruitment marketplace aesthetic

50.usage: Subtle backgrounds, hover states on light surfaces

500.note: Primary brand blue - Trust, intelligence, professionalism

accent.note: Success green - represents progress, AI insights, positive outcomes. PRESERVED.

success.usage: Application success, match scores, positive AI feedback

warning.usage: Attention needed, pending reviews, incomplete profiles

hero_primary.usage: Hero sections, landing page headers - subtle, elegant

brand_accent.usage: Premium CTAs, feature highlights, AI badges

subtle_mesh.value: radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, rgba(48, 86, 245, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 100% 100%, rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.06) 0%, transparent 50%)
subtle_mesh.usage: Page backgrounds, section overlays - premium texture

page.note: Pure white for maximum cleanliness and professionalism

page_subtle.note: NEW: Ultra-subtle tint for visual hierarchy without color

surface_elevated.note: NEW: Premium elevation with softer, larger shadows

surface_glass.note: NEW: Premium glassmorphism for modern aesthetics

subtle.note: Muted background for inputs, secondary surfaces

premium_overlay.note: NEW: Modal/drawer overlays with premium blur

primary.note: Primary text - maximum legibility and sophistication

tertiary.note: NEW: Tertiary text for metadata, timestamps

muted.note: ENHANCED: Lighter muted text for better hierarchy

inverted_secondary.note: NEW: Muted white for dark mode secondary text

subtle.note: NEW: Ultra-light borders for minimal separation

premium.note: NEW: Gradient borders for premium elements

typography.font_primary: Inter, ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
typography.font_secondary: Plus Jakarta Sans, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif
typography.font_mono: JetBrains Mono, 'Fira Code', Consolas, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace

spacing.philosophy: Consistent 8px rhythm creates visual harmony. Generous whitespace conveys premium quality.

breakpoints.note: Mobile-first approach, 2xl added for premium desktop experiences

max_content_width.note: Optimal reading widths for different content types

radius_and_borders.border_philosophy: Subtle borders create separation without distraction. Premium feel through restraint.

elevation.philosophy: Sophisticated shadow system creates depth perception and premium quality. Soft, layered shadows instead of harsh edges.

level_1.usage: Subtle elevation for inputs, secondary cards

level_5.usage: NEW: Premium modals, hero cards, floating elements

premium_glow.usage: NEW: Brand-colored glow for CTAs and premium features

success_glow.usage: NEW: Success state glow for positive feedback

cta_primary.usage: Primary CTA buttons, main actions, AI features

cta_primary_hover.usage: Primary button hover state - deepens trust

cta_text.usage: Text on primary buttons - maximum contrast

card_background.usage: Card and panel backgrounds - clean slate

iconography_imagery.icon_style: Outline icons with 2px stroke width, rounded terminals - modern, clean, scalable

image_treatments.rounded_corners: radius-lg (16px) for cards, radius-2xl (24px) for heroes

card_interactive.note: Clickable cards with enhanced hover states

styles.background: radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, rgba(48, 86, 245, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 100% 100%, rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.06) 0%, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(180deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #F9FAFB 100%)

micro_interactions.philosophy: Smooth, purposeful motion enhances user experience. Every animation should feel intentional and premium.

stagger_list.usage: List items, grid cards, feature sections

accessibility.philosophy: Inclusive design is premium design. WCAG 2.1 AA compliance is mandatory, AAA preferred.

keyboard_navigation.esc_to_close: All overlays closeable with Escape key

aria_guidelines.roles: Use semantic HTML first, ARIA roles when needed (navigation, main, dialog, alert)
aria_guidelines.labels: aria-label for icon-only buttons, aria-labelledby for sections
aria_guidelines.live_regions: aria-live='polite' for dynamic updates, 'assertive' for urgent alerts
aria_guidelines.descriptions: aria-describedby for helper text, error messages

motion_preferences.fallback: Fade-only transitions, 0.01ms duration for instant changes

color_blind_safe.avoid_color_only: Never rely solely on color to convey information
color_blind_safe.use_patterns: Combine color with icons, text labels, or patterns

screen_reader.alt_text: Descriptive alt text for all images
screen_reader.landmarks: Use main, nav, aside, footer elements

touch_targets.implementation: Expand touch area beyond visual bounds if needed

responsive_design.mobile_first_css: Base styles for mobile, @media queries for larger screens

touch_optimization.hover_alternatives: Tap or long-press for mobile hover states

layout_patterns.mobile: Single column, stacked content, collapsible navigation

image_optimization.formats: WebP with fallbacks, AVIF for premium quality

performance_optimization.philosophy: Speed is a feature. Premium experiences are fast experiences.

asset_optimization.images: Compress, use modern formats (WebP, AVIF), lazy load
asset_optimization.fonts: Subset fonts, preload critical fonts, font-display: swap
asset_optimization.css: Critical CSS inline, defer non-critical, minify
asset_optimization.js: Code split, tree shake, minify, defer non-critical

dark_mode.approach: System preference detection with manual override
dark_mode.implementation: CSS variables or Tailwind dark: variant

color_adjustments.text: Invert hierarchy, reduce pure white to #E5E7EB
color_adjustments.borders: Lighten borders in dark mode for visibility
color_adjustments.shadows: Adjust shadows to use black with higher opacity

dark_mode.image_treatment: Reduce brightness/opacity of images in dark mode

best_practices: Use HSL for colors to easily create variants (lightness adjustments)
Leverage CSS custom properties for runtime theme switching
Use Tailwind's JIT mode with arbitrary values sparingly
Always include focus-visible states for accessibility
Implement prefers-reduced-motion for all animations
Use semantic HTML elements (nav, main, article, aside, footer)
Test contrast ratios with tools like WebAIM Contrast Checker
Use rem for typography and spacing, px for borders
Implement mobile-first responsive design
Optimize images (WebP, lazy loading, responsive srcset)
Use font-display: swap to prevent FOIT
Implement skeleton loaders for perceived performance
Use transform and opacity for smooth animations (GPU-accelerated)
Debounce expensive operations (search, resize listeners)
Implement proper loading and error states
Use proper ARIA labels and roles
Test with keyboard navigation
Test with screen readers
Implement proper form validation with accessible error messages
Use consistent spacing system (8px base unit)

premium_mesh_background.css:
background: 
  radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, rgba(48, 86, 245, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%),
  radial-gradient(at 100% 100%, rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.06) 0%, transparent 50%),
  linear-gradient(180deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #F9FAFB 100%);

brand_tokens.note: Colors measured from source, premium enhancements added

components.note: Enhanced with premium variants and AI-specific components

animations.note: Refined for premium feel with sophisticated easings

accessibility.note: WCAG 2.1 AA standards with AAA preferences
